Description:

Capitalising on the north-facing aspect, the spacious lounge and dining zone is a tranquil space for daily living and entertaining with large windows that frame the garden scenery and polished timber floors that create a light and airy ambiance within the room.
The kitchen features a stainless-steel freestanding oven, quality ASKO dishwasher and a sociable island bench for relaxed dining.
